title: Contract Update History Response
description: Response for contract_update_history request, containing the historical and most recent update status

contract_update_history.description: Contains the historical and the most recent update status of the contract

display_name.description: Display name of the changed parameter.

order_date.description: The epoch when the changed was done.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
